name: queue
description: (Music bot) View and edit the music queue.

options.name: from
options.description: Optionally specify the track to start listing the queue from, such as queue 10.

options.name: tracks
options.description: Remove tracks by their position in the queue.

options.name: numbers
options.description: Track # in queue to remove. Accepts ranges such as: remove 1, remove 1-4, remove 3-, remove all

options.name: user
options.description: Remove tracks by the user who queued them.

options.name: who
options.description: The user to remove queued tracks from.

options.name: loop
options.description: Toggle queue looping. When enabled, tracks are re-added to the queue after they finish playing.

options.name: replay
options.description: Re-add the currently playing audio track to the end of the queue.

options.name: shuffle
options.description: Shuffles the audio tracks currently in queue.

options.name: clear
options.description: Removes all audio tracks waiting in queue. Does not skip the current track.
